main event: An unidentified flying object was observed by military personnel at Lowry AFB, Colorado on June 2, 1958.
interesting points: The object was initially thought to be a falling leaf or small bird but was later seen to be a white-silvery object descending rapidly,The sighting lasted for approximately 4-5 minutes,The object appeared to divide or separate into two parts before disappearing,The sighting was reported by a reliable observer with experience in aerial objects,This incident is noted as part of Project Blue Book's investigations into UFO phenomena.
witness description: A reliable observer experienced with aerial objects.
